About Me

Who Am I?

Hello! I'm Zhou Zhouyou, the owner and main author of this website. I'm currently a student passionate about programming, algorithms, and software development.

I created this blog to document my learning journey and share solutions to interesting coding problems. You'll find a variety of content here, from algorithm explanations to web development tutorials.

  • Web Development
  • Jekyll & Static Site Generation
